channel.title: Shop issues
channel.description:
today i made my own shop and something weird happen i added everything correct but the when u click it it makes u fish instead of pulling up the shop i added to the npc ]
this is the code i added in client.java [code]} else if (NPCID == 520) {// my shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 90;[/code] then i added this in autospawn.cfg [code]spawn = 520 2656 9347 0 0 0 0 0 1 myshop[/code]
this is code i added in shop.cfg [code]shop = 90 phat_shop 1 1 1046 50000 1044 50000 1042 50000 1040 50000 1039 50000[/code] tell me what is wrong

item.title: Shop issues

item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

today i made my own shop and something weird happen i added everything correct but the when u click it it makes u fish instead of pulling up the shop i added to the npc ]

this is the code i added in client.java

} else if (NPCID == 520) {// my shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 90;
then i added this in autospawn.cfg

spawn = 520	2656	9347	0	0	0	0	0	1	myshop

this is code i added in shop.cfg

shop = 90	phat_shop	1	1	1046	50000	1044	50000	1042	50000	1040	50000	1039	50000

tell me what is wrong
